text: Seyoum Mesfin Gebredingel (25 January 1949 - 13 January 2021) was an Ethiopian politician. He was Ethiopia's Minister of Foreign Affairs from 1991 until September 2010. He was Ethiopia's Ambassador to the People's Republic of China from 2010 until 2017. Mesfin was born in Adigrat, Ethiopia. He was a member of the People's Revolutionary Democratic Front. Seyoum was killed during the Tigray War by the Ethiopian National Defense Force on 13 January 2021, aged 71. ==References== Category:1949 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Ethiopian politicians Category:Ambassadors to China Category:Deaths by firearm
title: Seyoum Mesfin
